channel.title: Blindsmyth - Blind My debut Album is out
channel.description:
Hi Friends,
this friday I've released my debut album as Blindsmyth. While I made the songs before I got my axoloti, many of the sample manipulation tecnicques were the inspiration and drive for my looper/sampler stuff I do with the axoloti now.
https://blindsmyth.bandcamp.com/album/blind https://open.spotify.com/album/5yh6In4DQLVX6Rd3WTjvkw
For example on Stuck there are this reversed guitar chords, I tried douzens of pedals trying to recreate this live, finally with the axoloti I can do it now :slight_smile: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JLIaOPIUPzs
You can catch me at one of these dates: 09.02. Berlin, Beate Uwe 02.03. Hamburg, Uebel und Gef채hrlich 03.03. M체nchen, Harry Klein 24.03. Magdeburg, Insel der Jugend 20.04. Berlin, Mensch Meier 30.04. Hamburg, Hafenklang

Hi Friends,

this friday I've released my debut album as Blindsmyth. While I made the songs before I got my axoloti, many of the sample manipulation tecnicques were the inspiration and drive for my looper/sampler stuff I do with the axoloti now.
